public class MailUtil {	private String username = "10210240089@fudan.edu.cn";	private String password = "fudan123";	public void sendMail() {		Properties props = new Properties();		props.put("mail.smtp.auth", "true");		props.put("mail.smtp.starttls.enable", "true");		props.put("mail.smtp.host", "mail.fudan.edu.cn");		props.put("mail.smtp.port", "25");
测试弱口令的时候发现的...
